title: Zeit EisTrendhower 4/28: Russian State TV, Ben Shapiro, Kamala Harris, Olivia Wilde, Laura Ingraham & Dream Concerts
itunes:title: Zeit EisTrendhower 4/28: Russian State TV, Ben Shapiro, Kamala Harris, Olivia Wilde, Laura Ingraham & Dream Concerts
description:
In this edition of Trends, Jack and Miles discuss Russian State TV personalities reassuring the Russian public that nuclear war might not be so bad, Ben Shapiro debating "wokeness" with college students at Iowa State, Kamala Harris being referred to as just "Kamala" in a headline by Politico, Olivia Wilde being served custody papers on stage will promoting her new film 'Don't Worry Darling,' Laura Ingraham's views on student loan forgiveness & dream concert lineups. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

itunes:keywords: Daily Zeitgeist, Russia, Ben Shapiro, Kamala Harris, Olivia Wilde, Laura Ingraham, Don't Worry Darling, Loan Forgiveness, Dream Concert, Spotify
